attributes.action: Hold parade for manchester united in manchester city centre for end of season celebrations
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If we are to prove to the world that we can hold major sporting events in the u.k we need to show that what happened in manchester was a "one off" I think the city of manchester and the fans will be very upset with no parade. Why let a small minority ruin it for the people of manchester?

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
